mapper.insert: insert into board_table(boardWriter, boardPassword, boardTitle, boardContents, boardCreatedDate) values (#{boardWriter}, #{boardPassword}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents}, now())

insert into board_table (boardWriter, boardPassword, boardTitle, boardContents, boardCreatedDate, boardFileName) values (#{boardWriter}, #{boardPassword}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents}, now(), #{boardFileName})
